# Design matrix Definition
```{r design-matrix}
metadata_merged <- colData(se_merged)

group <- gsub(" ", "_", unlist(metadata_merged$group)) 
group <- factor(make.names(group)) 
names(group) <- rownames(metadata_merged)
design <- model.matrix(~0 + group) 
colnames(design) <- gsub("group", "", colnames(design))
kable(design)
```

To fit a model in limma a contrast matrix is also needed.

```{r contrast-mtrix}
contrast.matrix <- makeContrasts(


  levels = design
)
kable(contrast.matrix)
```

# Set contrasts


```{r defining-contrasts, echo = TRUE}

contrasts <- c(
  "group1_vs_group2", 
  "group1_vs_group3",
  "group2_vs_group3"
)
```
